attributes.action: Have seat belts fitted on all public buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the law to ware a seatbelt when travelling in a car for our own safety. But when travelling on a public bus there are no seat belts available. Buses have just as much chance as being in an accident as other vehicles and seatbelst should be in place as should also be the law for buses.
